name: RoadNoiseforSleep
0:
”Alexa open road noise”
”Alexa ask road noise to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: road noise
des: Many people love the constant road noise of cars humming by as a fast way to fall asleep. Get started by saying, 'Alexa, open Road Noise,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
